gurmukhi: ਜੋਰ ਕੈ ਕੋਰ ਕੈ ਠੋਰ ਕੈ ਬੀਰ ਸੁ ਰਾਛਸ ਕੋ ਹਤਿ ਕੈ ਤਿਹ ਦੀਨੋ ||
transliteration: Jor Kai Kor Kai Boor Su Raachhas Ko Hat(i) Kai Tih Doono||
translation: She destroyed those demons, who had obstructed her advance with their strength, being arrayed in rows.

gurmukhi: ਖੋਰ ਕੈ ਤੋਰ ਕੈ ਬੋਰ ਕੈ ਦਾਨਵ ਲੈ ਤਿਨ ਕੇ ਕਰੇ ਹਾਡ ਚਬੀਨੋ ||
transliteration: Khor Kai Tor Kai Bor Kai Daanav Lai Tin Ke Kdare Haad Chaboono||
translation: Eroding the demons by creating fear, she ultimately crushed their bones.

gurmukhi: ਸ੍ਰੳੁਣ ਕੋ ਪਾਨ ਕਰਿਓ ਜਿੳੁ ਦਵਾ ਹਰਿ ਸਾਗਰ ਕੋ ਜਲ ਜਿੳੁ ਰਿਖਿ ਪੀਨੋ ||੧੩੩||
transliteration: Sraoun Ko Paan Kario Jio Davaa Har(i) Saagad Ko Jal Jio Rikh(i) Poono||133||
translation: She drank the blood as Krishna quaffed fire and the sage agastya drank the water of ocean.133.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਡ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ਕੁਵੰਡ ਕਰੰ ਗਹਿ ਜੁੱਧ ਕਰਿਓ ਨ ਗਨੇ ਭਟ ਅਾਨੇ ||
transliteration: Channd Prachanndd Kuvand Karan Gad(i) Juddh Kario Na Gade Bhat Aane||
translation: Chandi began the war very swiftly holding the bow in her hand; she killed the unaccountable number of demons.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਰ ਦੲੀ ਸਭ ਦੈਤ ਚਮੂੰ ਤਿਹ ਸ੍ਰੳੁਣਤ ਜੰਬੁਕ ਗ੍ਰਿੱਝ ਅਘਾਨੇ ||
transliteration: Maar Daoo Sabh Dait Chamoond Tih Sraounat Janbouk Grijjh Aghaane||
translation: She killed all the army of the demon Raktavija and with their blood, the jackals and vultures satisfied their hunger.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਲ ਭਯਾਨਕ ਦੇਖਿ ਭਵਾਨੀ ਕੋ ਦਾਨਵ ੲਿੳੁ ਰਨ ਛਾਡ ਪਰਾਨੇ ||
transliteration: Dhaal Bhauaanak Dekh(i) Bhavaanoo Ko Daanav Io Ran Chhaad Paraane||
translation: Seeing the dreadful face of the goddess, the demons ran away from the field like this.

gurmukhi: ਪੳੁਨ ਕੇ ਗੳੁਨ ਕੇ ਤੇਜ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ ਤੇ ਪੀਪਰ ਕੇ ਜਿੳੁ ਪਾਤ ੳੁਡਾਨੇ ||੧੩੪||
transliteration: Paoun Ke Gaddd Ke Tej Prataap Ke Poopar Ke Jio Paat Udaane||134||
translation: Just as with the blowing of swift and forceful wind, the leaves of the fig tree (peepal) fly away.134.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਹਵ ਮੈ ਖਿਝ ਕੈ ਬਰ ਚੰਡ ਕਰੰ ਧਰ ਕੈ ਹਰਿ ਪੈ ਅਰ ਮਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Aahav Mai Khijh Kai Bar Channd Karan Dhar Kai Har(i) Pai Ar Mdare||
translation: With great the mighty Chandika, holding the sword in her hand, destroyed the horses and the enemies.

gurmukhi: ੲੇਕਨ ਤੀਰਨ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਗਦਾ ਹਤਿ ੲੇਕਨ ਕੇ ਤਨ ਕੇਹਰਿ ਫਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Ekan Tooran Chakkra Gadaa Hat(i) Ekan Ke Tan Kehar(i) Phdare||
translation: Many were killed with arrows, disc and mace and the bodies of many were torn by the lion.

gurmukhi: ਹੈ ਦਲ ਗੈ ਦਲ ਪੈ ਦਲ ਘਾੲਿ ਕੈ ਮਾਰ ਰਥੀ ਬਿਰਥੀ ਕਰ ਡਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Hai Dal Gad Dal Paid Al Ghaae Kai Maar Rathoo Birthoo Kar Ddare||
translation: She killed the forces on horses, elephants and on foot and wounding those on chariots hath rendered them without chariots.

gurmukhi: ਸਿੰਧੁਰ ਅੈਸੇ ਪਰੇ ਤਿਹ ਠੳੁਰ ਜਿੳੁ ਭੂਮਿ ਮੈ ਝੂਮਿ ਗਿਰੇ ਗਿਰ ਭਾਰੇ ||੧੩੫||
transliteration: Sindhur Aise Dare Tih Thaur Jio Bhoom(i) Mai Jhoom(i) Gire Gir Bhdare||135||
translation: The elements lying on the ground at that place seem to have fallen like mountains during the earthquake.135.
